Welcome to UVMS Vendor Management License Management Policy Access Secure & Role-Based Access Coming Soon
Manage vendors efficiently within the University environment. Simplifying registration, licensing, and policy awareness. Register new vendors, store profiles, manage login credentials, and monitor activity. Track license issuance, expiry, status, request renewals, and get admin approvals. View, search, and filter university policies. Admins can upload new policies. Vendor login/logout, hashed passwords, role-based access for vendors and admins. Online payments, SMS/Email reminders, and vendor performance analytics dashboard.
